attributes.action: extend the time period in which postal voting ballot papers are sent to ex-patriots living abroad to reflect the extended postal timeframes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The guidance notes included with applications for ex-patriot postal voting state that the ballot papers may not be sent out until 4 days before an election. This leaves insufficient time to ensure your vote counts, effectively robbing you of your vote
